text: Syria was first at the Olympic Games in 1948. The nation came back to the Games in 1968. They also missed the 1976 Games. The nation has not been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Syria was formed in 1948. ==List of medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Joseph Atiyeh 1984 Los Angeles Wrestling Men's freestyle heavyweight Ghada Shouaa 1996 Atlanta Athletics Women's heptathlon Nasser Al Shami 2004 Athens Boxing Men's heavyweight ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * Syrian Arab Republic profile at London2012.com Category:Syria Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Syria at the Olympics
